PROCESS_ITEMS.title: Create a free account
PROCESS_ITEMS.description: Your receipts will be stored in your own account and only visible by you and who you share it to.

PROCESS_ITEMS.title: Visit a participating retailer
PROCESS_ITEMS.description: All it takes is a simple QR code scan at the checkout then you're on your way -  no paper, no fuss

PROCESS_ITEMS.title: Enjoy a paperless shopping future!
PROCESS_ITEMS.description: That's it! We'll handle it from here. All your receipts will be stored and accessible at anytime!

FAQ_DATA.title: How to contact with Customer Service?
FAQ_DATA.description: Our Customer Experience Team is available 7 days a week and we offer 2 ways to get in contact.Email and Chat . We try to reply quickly, so you need not to wait too long for a response!.

FAQ_DATA.title: App installation failed, how to update system information?
FAQ_DATA.description: Please read the documentation carefully . We also have some online  video tutorials regarding this issue . If the problem remains, Please Open a ticket in the support forum .

FAQ_DATA.title: Website reponse taking time, how to improve?
FAQ_DATA.description: At first, Please check your internet connection . We also have some online  video tutorials regarding this issue . If the problem remains, Please Open a ticket in the support forum .

FAQ_DATA.title: New update fixed all bug and issues?
FAQ_DATA.description: We are giving the update of this theme continuously . You will receive an email Notification when we push an update. Always try to be updated with us .

FEATURES.title: Organisation
FEATURES.description: Your receipts will be sorted based on category, store, location and more! All for your easy access.

FEATURES.title: Safekeeping
FEATURES.description: No more faded or misplaced receipts. No more “I’m sure I have it somewhere” It’s OK. You’ve got it….in your Papercut account.

FEATURES.title: Secure
FEATURES.description: Be rest assured that your receipts can only be seen by you and you only. It's OK, we won't judge you for buying that Drake album.

FEATURES.title: Sharing
FEATURES.description: Easy to export to share with your mates, coworkers or to get those work reimbursements.

FEATURES.title: Budgeting
FEATURES.description: No more manual input into budget apps. Your budget will be updated automatically with every new receipt.

FEATURES.title: Environmentally Friendly
FEATURES.description: Our colour is green for a reason! You will be contributing to a healthier planet with little effort.
